entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
